Text: Great musical movie, one of my all time favorites.
Not the movie I remember, never saw this old version.  Crap.

The title does show it to be the 1960 version. Sorry I was not more clear. Let me state it explicitly. This is NOT the 1986 Musical. This is the Original "Little Shop of Horrors" directed by Roger Corman. Watch it. You might like it. And keep an eye out for a very young Jack Nicholson.
Thanks for this classic cult movie! :D
